description: Allows the mob to move near a target and drop an item.

drop_item_chance.description: The probability that the mob will drop an item.

entity_types.description: List of entity types this mob will drop items for.

loot_table.description: Loot table to select items from.

max_dist.description: Maximum distance in blocks this mob will look for entities to drop an item for.

offering_distance.description: The distance in blocks the mob will try to be away from the entity when it drops the item.
offering_distance.title: Offering Distance

on_drop_attempt.description: Event to run when this mob attempts to drop an item.
on_drop_attempt.title: On Drop Attempt

search_height.description: Height in blocks from the target the mob can be.
search_height.title: Search Height

search_range.description: The distance in blocks from the target the mob can be.
search_range.title: Search Range

time_of_day_range.description: The valid times of day that this goal can be used. For reference: noon is 0.0, sunset is 0.25, midnight is 0.5, and sunrise is 0.75, and back to noon for 1.0.
